pbi:mashup.document:
section Section1;
shared vw_Sales = let
  Source = Sql.Database(".", "AdventureWorks"),
  Navigation = Source{[Schema = "dbo", Item = "vw_Sales"]}[Data]
in
  Navigation;
shared FactOrderDetails = let
  Source = vw_Sales,
  #"Added Custom" = Table.AddColumn(Source, "OrderDateKey", each Date.ToText([OrderDate], "yyyyMMdd")),
  #"Added Custom1" = Table.AddColumn(#"Added Custom", "DueDateKey", each Date.ToText([DueDate], "yyyyMMdd")),
  #"Added Custom2" = Table.AddColumn(#"Added Custom1", "ShipDateKey", each Date.ToText([ShipDate], "yyyyMMdd")),
  #"Changed Type1" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Added Custom2",{{"OrderDateKey", Int64.Type}, {"DueDateKey", Int64.Type}, {"ShipDateKey", Int64.Type}}),
  #"Removed Other Columns" = Table.SelectColumns(#"Changed Type1",{"OrderDetailID", "OrderID", "StatusID", "OnlineOrderFlag", "CustomerID", "SalesPersonID", "TerritoryID", "ShipMethodID", "ProductID", "OrderQty", "UnitPrice", "LineTotal", "TaxAmt", "Freight", "TotalDue", "OrderDateKey", "DueDateKey", "ShipDateKey"})
in
    #"Removed Other Columns";
shared DimStatuses = let
  Source = vw_Sales,
  #"Choose columns" = Table.SelectColumns(Source, {"StatusID", "Status"}),
  #"Removed duplicates" = Table.Distinct(#"Choose columns", {"StatusID", "Status"})
in
  #"Removed duplicates";
shared DimTerritories = let
    Source = vw_Sales,
    #"Changed Type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(Source,{{"OrderDetailID", Int64.Type}, {"OrderID", Int64.Type}, {"OrderDate", type date}, {"DueDate", type date}, {"ShipDate", type date}, {"StatusID", Int64.Type}, {"Status", type text}, {"OnlineOrderFlag", Int64.Type}, {"CustomerID", Int64.Type}, {"SalesPersonID", Int64.Type}, {"TerritoryID", Int64.Type}, {"Territory", type text}, {"TerritoryGroup", type text}, {"ShipMethodID", Int64.Type}, {"ShipMethod", type text}, {"ProductID", Int64.Type}, {"Product", type text}, {"ProductSubCategory", type text}, {"ProductCategory", type text}, {"OrderQty", Int64.Type}, {"UnitPrice", type number}, {"LineTotal", type number}, {"TaxAmt", type number}, {"Freight", type number}, {"TotalDue", type number}}),
    #"Removed Columns" = Table.RemoveColumns(#"Changed Type",{"OrderID"}),
    #"Removed Other Columns" = Table.SelectColumns(#"Removed Columns",{"TerritoryID", "Territory", "TerritoryGroup"}),
    #"Removed Duplicates" = Table.Distinct(#"Removed Other Columns", {"Territory"})
in
    #"Removed Duplicates";
shared DimShipMethods = let
  Source = vw_Sales,
  #"Changed Type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(Source,{{"OrderDetailID", Int64.Type}, {"OrderID", Int64.Type}, {"OrderDate", type date}, {"DueDate", type date}, {"ShipDate", type date}, {"StatusID", Int64.Type}, {"Status", type text}, {"OnlineOrderFlag", Int64.Type}, {"CustomerID", Int64.Type}, {"SalesPersonID", Int64.Type}, {"TerritoryID", Int64.Type}, {"Territory", type text}, {"TerritoryGroup", type text}, {"ShipMethodID", Int64.Type}, {"ShipMethod", type text}, {"ProductID", Int64.Type}, {"Product", type text}, {"ProductSubCategory", type text}, {"ProductCategory", type text}, {"OrderQty", Int64.Type}, {"UnitPrice", type number}, {"LineTotal", type number}, {"TaxAmt", type number}, {"Freight", type number}, {"TotalDue", type number}}),
  #"Removed Columns" = Table.RemoveColumns(#"Changed Type",{"OrderID"}),
  #"Removed Other Columns" = Table.SelectColumns(#"Removed Columns",{"ShipMethodID", "ShipMethod"}),
  #"Removed Duplicates" = Table.Distinct(#"Removed Other Columns")
in
  #"Removed Duplicates";
shared DimProducts = let
    Source = vw_Sales,
    #"Changed Type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(Source,{{"OrderDetailID", Int64.Type}, {"OrderID", Int64.Type}, {"OrderDate", type date}, {"DueDate", type date}, {"ShipDate", type date}, {"StatusID", Int64.Type}, {"Status", type text}, {"OnlineOrderFlag", Int64.Type}, {"CustomerID", Int64.Type}, {"SalesPersonID", Int64.Type}, {"TerritoryID", Int64.Type}, {"Territory", type text}, {"TerritoryGroup", type text}, {"ShipMethodID", Int64.Type}, {"ShipMethod", type text}, {"ProductID", Int64.Type}, {"Product", type text}, {"ProductSubCategory", type text}, {"ProductCategory", type text}, {"OrderQty", Int64.Type}, {"UnitPrice", type number}, {"LineTotal", type number}, {"TaxAmt", type number}, {"Freight", type number}, {"TotalDue", type number}}),
    #"Removed Columns" = Table.RemoveColumns(#"Changed Type",{"OrderID"}),
    #"Removed Other Columns" = Table.SelectColumns(#"Removed Columns",{"ProductID", "Product", "ProductSubCategory", "ProductCategory"}),
    #"Removed Duplicates" = Table.Distinct(#"Removed Other Columns")
in
    #"Removed Duplicates";
shared DimDates = let
  Source = List.Dates(#date( 2011, 1, 1 ),Â (365 * 10) + 1, #duration( 1, 0, 0, 0 )),
  #"Converted to table" = Table.FromList(Source, Splitter.SplitByNothing(), null, null, ExtraValues.Error),
  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(#"Converted to table", {{"Column1", "Date"}}),
  #"Changed column type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Renamed columns", {{"Date", type date}}),
  #"Inserted year" = Table.AddColumn(#"Changed column type", "Year", each Date.Year([Date]), type nullable number),
  #"Inserted month" = Table.AddColumn(#"Inserted year", "Month", each Date.Month([Date]), type nullable number),
  #"Inserted day" = Table.AddColumn(#"Inserted month", "Day", each Date.Day([Date]), type nullable number)
in
  #"Inserted day";
